Class AStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • AStar

  • public class AStar
extends java.lang.Object

    A* Pathfinding

    This program performs A* Pathfinding
    Author:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIAGONAL_COST
      Instantiates cost for diagonal moves
      static int V_H_COST
      Instantiates cost for vertical and horizontal moves

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AStar(int width, int height, int si, int sj, int ei, int ej, int[][] blocks)
      Sets up the grid for the pathfinding algorithm as well as the start and ending coordinates

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display()
      Displays the board
      void displayScores()
      Displays the cost of each reachable location on the board along the path to the end

      Displays the chosen path
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      Processes the cost of the board

    • Constructor Detail

      • AStar

        public AStar(int width,
             int height,
             int si,
             int sj,
             int ei,
             int ej,
             int[][] blocks)
        Sets up the grid for the pathfinding algorithm as well as the start and ending coordinates
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the grid
        height - the height of the grid
        si - the row of the start cell
        sj - the column of the start cell
        ei - the row of the end cell
        ej - the column of the end cell
        blocks - the coordinates of the path blocks

    • Method Detail

      • updateCostIfNeeded

        public void updateCostIfNeeded(Cell current,
                               Cell t,
                               int cost)
        Updates the cost of each route as needed
        Parameters:
        current - the current cell we're on
        t - the cell we're moving to
        cost - the cost of making this move

        Processes the cost of the board
